title: Interpretation of selling drugs in a dream Selling hashish in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of selling drugs or hashish to a single girl, married, pregnant, or divorced, or to a man, either drinking green hashish, or buying insults to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, to ​​Al. - Al-Nabulsi and others: Drugs in dreams are among the very frightening and frightening dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, because they cause a great state of fear and panic in the dreamer’s life when he sees them, as drugs are prohibited in all heavenly religions, which causes complete loss of consciousness, destruction of health, and death in the end, Many doctors around the world also advise staying away from it, as we may see medicines in our dreams in different forms. Interpretation of selling drugs in a dream: Whoever sees that he is selling hashish or crushing it, interprets it from three angles: insanity, committing a terrible act, and weak resolve. The translator Ibn Serene has important meanings and associations when seeing drugs in a dream, which the dreamer must know very precisely in order to know the reason for the dream. Interpretation of drugs in a dream Seeing drugs in a dream is evidence of the dreamer escaping responsibility in his life. Drugs also show problems and mistakes that a person is escaping from. Drugs in a dream mean escaping from burdens and responsibility. Drugs are evidence of the internal conflicts that occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing drugs in a dream is evidence of the illegal money that the dreamer has obtained. Drinking drugs in a dream is evidence of the problems and difficulties that a person faces in his life. Taking drugs in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s weak character in life and following the wrong and bad path. Taking drugs in a dream is evidence of exposure to psychological trauma and severe depression in the dreamer’s life. Taking drugs in a dream is a sign of bad behavior in all decisions. Seeing other people taking drugs In a dream, it means that his thoughts do not agree with the thoughts of those around him. Taking large doses of medicine in a dream is evidence of the disaster that a person is exposed to. Growing cannabis in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s approach. Drug smuggling in a dream is evidence of a person’s kindness in the near future. Trade Weed and heroin in a dream are evidence of the illegal money that the dreamer acquires. Seeing a large amount of weed in a dream indicates boredom in the dreamer’s life. Drug dealing in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to obtain money illegally. Smelling dust in a dream is evidence On the righteousness of the dreamer. Using drugs in a dream is evidence of the poverty that the person will suffer from. Single people seeing cannabis planted elsewhere is evidence of a marriage soon. Seeing weed growing on the dreamer’s body is a sign of happiness that will come to him in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about using Hashish - YouTube

title: Interpretation of memorizing the Qur’an in a dream and memorizing the Holy Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: The dream of memorizing the Qur’an for a married girl, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman. Memorizing the Qur’an in a dream is one of the dreams that we see in our dreams, and it carries for us many important meanings and connotations that appear in the near future for the dreamer’s goodness and happiness. Also, the Qur’an is one of the beautiful and beloved things for many people, especially for Muslims, that does not... It can be rejected in our lives. It was revealed by God Almighty to the Noble Messenger to complete the Islamic religion, and when it is seen in a dream, it means many important meanings for us. Interpretation of memorizing the Qur’an in a dream: Whoever sees that he has memorized the Qur’an and has not memorized it will attain a kingdom due to the Almighty’s saying: (I am the companion of those who know). Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream for a woman Single: Seeing an unmarried woman reading the Qur’an in a dream with her friends means that she will find happiness soon. Seeing an unmarried woman reciting the Holy Qur’an with a handsome man she did not see in the dream is evidence that she will marry someone who has good morals. Also, reciting the Qur’an in a dream is for an unmarried woman. A married woman is evidence that she will get a living in the near future. Reading the Qur’an in a dream is a sign of goodness and happiness in the future. Interpretation of the Qur’an in a married woman’s dream. A married woman’s dream of reciting the Qur’an to her children is evidence that God grants goodness to her children. Seeing people reciting the Qur’an in a dream is a sign of A happy married life that she will enjoy. Also, reading the Qur’an in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will soon find happiness with her husband. A married woman seeing her husband reading the Qur’an to her in a dream means that the husband will come to her and love her more. Interpretation of the Qur’an in a divorced woman’s dream: Seeing a divorced woman reciting the Qur’an In a dream, it is evidence that she will be good in both the secular and religious worlds. Seeing a woman reading the Holy Qur’an and memorizing it is evidence that God will soon guide her to the straight path. Reciting the Qur’an in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence of the good that will come to her in the near future and that she will be free of all problems. In the near future. Reading the Qur’an in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence of the beautiful and joyful changes that she will experience soon. Interpretation of memorizing the Qur’an in a dream - YouTube

title: Dream of peaches for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is looking at peaches from afar and wants them. This indicates that at this time in her life she will be very interested in an important topic, and God knows best. The unmarried girl said that she was looking at peaches in the dream, and she was At home a lot and she was happy about it. This indicates that during this period she will achieve something very important in her life, and God knows best. An unmarried woman who looks at rotten peaches in a dream and they look foul and smell bad. It appears that she will face great sadness and a great tragedy in her life during this period. Also, an unmarried woman seeing in a dream that she is eating a lot of peaches in the dream and she is happy with the food. A clear interpretation that she will soon get all the things she wants in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating figs from a tree for single women. Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream for a married woman if she A married woman dreams that she was sitting at the bottom of a peach tree in a dream. This is a sign that she will get rid of the big problems that she was going through in her life. And a married woman seeing that she ate a lot of peaches in a dream and she is happy about it is a sign that she will achieve something that she has been trying for since. A long period in her life, God willing. If she sees a peach in a dream, she is beautiful, but she was far from her in the dream. It says that she will face severe anxiety about something in her life and will be sad about it, and God knows best. A married woman searches for a peach tree in a dream and sits next to it in a dream. A reference to She will become pregnant very soon, and will give birth to a boy, God willing, with whom she will be happy. Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she has a lot of peaches in front of her and she was eating a lot of them. This indicates that she will see new things in her life and be happy with her affairs, God willing. As A divorced woman who is looking for peaches in a dream in many places and does not see them indicates that she will face great suffering and extreme poverty in her life and will not be able to end it. Likewise, seeing a divorced woman looking at peaches from afar in a dream as she wishes indicates that she will worry about an issue. An important one in her life, and it will occupy the heart and be attached in the coming period. As if a divorced woman sees a lot of peaches in a dream and eats them with happiness and passion, it indicates that she will achieve something that she has tried hard for in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Read also: Apples in a single woman’s dream, interpretation Seeing peaches in a dream for a man and its meaningIf someone sees in a dream that he is looking at peaches in a dream, and does not want to eat them. It explains that he will see in his work things that concern him and sadden him in the coming period. Rather, seeing the dreamer in a dream that he is buying large quantities of peaches in a dream. It appears He will undertake many tasks in his work and will be busy with them at this time. As for the man who dreams that he is eating peaches, and their taste was very delicious, he declares that he will see good things in his life, God willing, and he will be very happy with them. And the dreamer who sees in the dream that peaches were abundant in with me

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream from Ibn Sirin, carrying a child in a dream, seeing a child buying in a dream and seeing a child selling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream: Seeing a child is considered one of the visions that leave a good impression on the owner, and this vision has many connotations that vary based on many factors, including that the child may be ugly or beautiful, and he may be sick, or he may watch him drown, and what concerns us in this article is mentioning all the cases. And the special connotations of seeing a child in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Seeing a child in a dream: Seeing a child indicates kindness, decency in dealing, innocence, good morals, avoiding corrupt situations, and a good spirit. If someone sees a child in a dream, this indicates the inner nature And the emotional and emotional demands and the constant desire to achieve satisfaction. This vision is also an indication of accumulating responsibilities, tasks that multiply over time, and multitasking that can cause some anxiety and stress about how the person will manage tomorrow. If the dreamer sees the child smiling at him, this indicates purity Peace, psychological comfort, achieving a high rank, achieving the goal, and the absence of desire. Seeing a child also indicates common sense, good morals, honesty in speech and action, and avoiding any influences that may corrupt and pollute the interior. If one sees a child descending from the sky, this expresses the near relief, and the end of the experience. And sadness and the end of the dark phase of the dreamer’s life. Seeing a child is also a sign of happiness, joy, happy occasions, and receiving a period of prosperity, good news, blessings, and success in the coming days. Seeing a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing a child that the vision indicates worries, responsibilities, and a large number of The burdens of life and entering into challenges and competitions aimed at managing the affairs of today and tomorrow. If a person sees a male child in a dream, it indicates the presence of a person who hates him and shows him love, and this may be an indication of the enemy’s weakness and weakness. If the child has dark skin, this is an indication To receive important news and events in the coming period. If the child is white, this heralds the tidings of days full of prosperity, fertility, contentment, and the arrival of good news that will change conditions quickly and for the better. If the child is ugly, this indicates sadness, extreme distress, feelings of anguish, psychological pain, and many worries. And successive crises and entering into conflicts with others without clear reasons. Seeing a child is an indication of his ability to get rid of complex issues with the simplest possible solutions and methods and to overcome obstacles and risks without any harm or arbitrariness to the viewer. Seeing a child can be a sign of the world and immersion in it, and the joys that take The mirror and makes him forget his duties and obligations, whether towards his family, his religion, and the afterlife. And whoever sees that he is teaching the child, he has obtained a great benefit, and has reached the goal that he has always wanted. But if one sees that he is a newborn, this indicates the approaching term, because the shroud is like A small child's robe. Seeing a child in a dream for single people. Seeing a child in a dream symbolizes an inclination towards...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a travel bag containing clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a suitcase containing clothes in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about a suitcase containing clothes in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know its interpretation, so we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars, The site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a suitcase containing clothes in a dream: Acquiring a suitcase full of clothes indicates the fulfillment of desires and dreams, thanks to God. Receiving a suitcase with clothes in a dream may indicate the large amount of legitimate money that The dreamer receives it during this period, thanks to God. If you see a suitcase in a dream, this may indicate good news coming to the dreamer in his life during those days. It is possible that the vision of acquiring a suitcase containing clothes in a dream indicates the fulfillment of one’s dreams and aspirations. During this period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about losing a school bag in a dream: Losing a school bag in a dream may indicate many missed opportunities in the dreamer’s life and he must ask God for help. Whoever sees in a dream that his school bag is lost, it may indicate the revelation of the secrets and hidden things that he has kept. The dreamer, and God knows best. In the event that he sees the loss of the school bag in a dream, this may be an indication of a financial loss that the dreamer may suffer during these days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the school bag lost in a dream indicates the worries and sorrow that the owner may suffer. The vision in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying a black bag in a dream: Buying a black bag in a dream may indicate the good deeds that the person with the vision will do in his life during that period. If one sees that he has bought a black bag in a dream, he may This indicates good events that may happen to the dreamer in his life in those days, thanks to God. Seeing that he bought a black bag in a dream may indicate success at work and obtaining a new job, thanks to God. If one sees that he has acquired a black bag in a dream, this may indicate To the abundance of money and the long life that he may acquire during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a bag containing perfumes in a dream: Acquiring a bag containing perfumes in a dream may indicate good changes that may occur to the dreamer in his life during those days. Seeing a person may indicate that he has He acquired a bag full of perfumes, which may indicate useful knowledge that the owner of the vision acquires in his life during those days, thanks to God. In the event that one sees that he has acquired a bag containing perfumes in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of money that the owner obtains. The vision in his life during those days. If you see a bag containing perfumes in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about extracting a tooth in a dream: The dream of extracting a tooth in a dream has many meanings, so extracting a tooth for children is a normal thing that does not cause worry or fear, but if the eldest is the one who actually extracts it, then here he shows old age, or that he suffers from a calcium deficiency, and now with the meanings of his vision In a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted in a dream? Some interpreters of visions and dreams said that losing one of your teeth is evidence of the loss of something precious and precious, but opinions still differ depending on the details and the social status of the pioneer, and this is what we will learn more by mentioning some of the details and concepts that accompany it. Sometimes Tooth extraction shows that the dreamer was able to obtain his rights from a powerful and influential person, after searching for him a lot and asking for help from people of influence in society, and finally obtains his rights with that person. There may be a secret in your life that you do not want anyone to know, and this is what You are prompted to see this dream because of the tendency of some people to pressure you to reveal your secrets. If you see that there is someone in your life who is removing this tooth from its place, he is the person who wants to interfere in your life, and cause you a lot of losses and damage, so you should beware of him and stay away from him. Get involved closely with him so that you can be safe by his side and avoid his vices. As for the unknown person who succeeds in extracting your tooth in a dream and causing you pain, it is an expression of the loss of a loved one, whether this loss is the result of a tragic accident that ended his life or he lost him. Morals were due to growing disagreements between you which led to the end of the relationship, and the feeling that follows this loss is sadness and pain. As for seeing one of your teeth with decay and having to extract it and feeling upset about it, there are many important things related to your personality that you should try to adjust so as not to You lose a lot of people around you because of your bad behavior in many common situations. If you see one of your teeth broken without knowing why or when it broke, this is a sign that people look at you indifferently and indifferently, which makes you prefer to spend your time alone and away from contact with those who bother you. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted by Ibn Sirin. The imam of interpretation scholars, Ibn Sirin, said that this vision has many meanings related to the fact that this tooth has been affected by decay, or was treated by a dentist specializing in dentistry, or was extracted by someone else. Hands, is this dislocation accompanied by blood or not? All these details have different meanings to each other. If blood bleeds when it is removed and the dreamer has a sister or a woman about to give birth, she will give birth easily and does not suffer from the severe pain that a woman feels during natural childbirth. But if it was neglected at that age even His condition worsened and the doctor had to treat and remove it. This dream indicates the dreamer’s escape from the position of responsibility in which he had recently been placed as a result of his death. The largest breadwinner, and the rest of the family members who thought he was capable of performing the duties assigned to him may fail. Ibn Sirin had a different point of view than others on the age issue related to tooth extraction.
preview.text: Interpretation of a dream about extracting a tooth in a dream: The dream of extracting a tooth in a dream has many meanings, so extracting a tooth for children is a normal thing that does not cause worry or fear, but if the eldest is the one who actually extracts it, then here he shows old age, or that he suffers from a calcium deficiency, and now with the meanings of his vision In a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted in a dream? Some interpreters of visions and dreams said that losing one of your teeth is evidence of the loss of something precious and precious, but opinions still differ depending on the details and the social status of the pioneer, and this is what we will learn more by mentioning some of the details and concepts that accompany it. Sometimes Tooth extraction shows that the dreamer was able to obtain his rights from a powerful and influential person, after searching for him a lot and asking for help from people of influence in society, and finally obtains his rights with that person. There may be a secret in your life that you do not want anyone to know, and this is what You are prompted to see this dream because of the tendency of some people to pressure you to reveal your secrets. If you see that there is someone in your life who is removing this tooth from its place, he is the person who wants to interfere in your life, and cause you a lot of losses and damage, so you should beware of him and stay away from him. Get involved closely with him so that you can be safe by his side and avoid his vices. As for the unknown person who succeeds in extracting your tooth in a dream and causing you pain, it is an expression of the loss of a loved one, whether this loss is the result of a tragic accident that ended his life or he lost him. Morals were due to growing disagreements between you which led to the end of the relationship, and the feeling that follows this loss is sadness and pain. As for seeing one of your teeth with decay and having to extract it and feeling upset about it, there are many important things related to your personality that you should try to adjust so as not to You lose a lot of people around you because of your bad behavior in many common situations. If you see one of your teeth broken without knowing why or when it broke, this is a sign that people look at you indifferently and indifferently, which makes you prefer to spend your time alone and away from contact with those who bother you. Interpretation of a dream about a tooth being extracted by Ibn Sirin. The imam of interpretation scholars, Ibn Sirin, said that this vision has many meanings related to the fact that this tooth has been affected by decay, or was treated by a dentist specializing in dentistry, or was extracted by someone else. Hands, is this dislocation accompanied by blood or not? All these details have different meanings to each other. If blood bleeds when it is removed and the dreamer has a sister or a woman about to give birth, she will give birth easily and does not suffer from the severe pain that a woman feels during natural childbirth. But if it was neglected at that age even His condition worsened and the doctor had to treat and remove it. This dream indicates the dreamer’s escape from the position of responsibility in which he had recently been placed as a result of his death. The largest breadwinner, and the rest of the family members who thought he was capable of performing the duties assigned to him may fail. Ibn Sirin had a different point of view than others on the age issue related to tooth extraction.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating delicious food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I ate delicious food in a dream, and its interpretations vary depending on how the vision was, so we learn in the following lines the interpretation of a dream that I ate delicious food in a dream..Interpretation of a dream of eating delicious food in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of eating delicious food in a dream can be a sign of goodness And happiness, and God knows best. If a young man is seen eating delicious food, this may indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl eating delicious food in a dream, perhaps this means that you will be freed from worry and sadness, God willing. If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating delicious food, she may This is a sign of happiness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I am eating leftover food in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I ate leftover food in a dream and it was sour. It could represent committing sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Because it may be an indication of warning the dreamer to repent to God, and God is aware of the unseen. When you see a single girl She eats the remains of spoiled food, as it may express a need, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself eating leftover food in a dream, this may indicate poverty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating spicy food in a dream Interpretation of a dream about eating spicy food in a dream could be a sign of a problem And God knows best. When you see yourself eating spicy foods in a dream, it may be a sign of misfortunes, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself eating spicy food in a dream, this may be evidence of unpleasant changes, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating spicy food in In a dream, this may indicate problems and fears, and God is Great and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating moldy bread in a dream could be a sign of an inability to make decisions, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating moldy bread, then she may This is evidence of a lack of wisdom, and God knows best. If a young man is seen eating moldy bread, this may lead to a wrong choice, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a married woman eating moldy bread in a dream may represent wrong thinking, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating spinach in a dream. Interpretation of the dream that you are eating spinach in A dream could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself eating spinach in a dream, this may indicate a good life, and God knows the unseen. When you see a married woman eating spinach, this could represent goodness and happiness, God willing. Also, seeing spinach in a dream could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. It indicates ease and marriage, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating mansaf in mourning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating mansaf in mourning in a dream could be a sign of liberation from worries, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if a married woman sees eating mansaf at a funeral in a dream, this may lead to liberation from Trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a married woman eating mansaf in mourning in a dream, this may represent relief from trouble

title: Interpretation of the dead kissing the living in a dream and the living kissing the dead in a dream

preview.html: When he sees a dead person, it is as if he is kissing him in a dream, or the dead person is kissing the fortune teller of a pregnant woman, a married woman, an unmarried girl, a divorced woman, a widow, the husband of Ibn Sirin, an-Nabulsi, and the Imam Al. - Sadiq and others kissing the dead in a dream. We have many dreams, and for many different reasons, every dreamer must know them as required, because kissing the dead is one of the things that appears to us in our circumstances to know the conditions of the dead. Especially if he is one of those close to us in public life, and we will explain to you, dear visitors, the interpretation of hugging and kissing the dead in a dream, as the translator Ibn Sirin explained to us in his interpretations for all people. Required. Interpretation of the living kissing the dead. Whoever sees a man, woman, or girl greeting a dead person whom he knows, he will receive from that dead person either knowledge of what he will live by or an increase in his status, or money from the money of that deceased person or from his family. The living dead, or they will improve from the effects of the actions of that dead person. But if he sees that he received a dead person whom he does not know or whose identity is unknown, then he will obtain sustenance and money from a party he does not know, in a time that has not been measured, and on his part he acted. You do not know and do not expect. Interpretation of the dead: Kissing the animal. Whoever sees a dead person before him in his dream, then that dreamer will obtain goodness and money from the inheritance of that dead person, and commentators say that the dead person will receive reward and good deeds. The good and benefit of inheritance for the deceased or his living family entourage. Interpretation of kissing the dead in a dream. Seeing yourself hugging and kissing the dead in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer longs to see the deceased and learn about his condition and the extent of love that exists between them. If the dreamer sees that a dead stranger kisses him on the cheek, this is evidence that the dreamer has great acceptance in public life, as he will get what he desires in public life, especially in Waiting status. Something like work and things. Embracing a dead person in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a generous person and gives zakat to people and is not stingy with anything. The dreamer has great value before his Lord. The dreamer seeing the dead person kissing him on the cheek in the dream is evidence that the dreamer is a humble person and has good morals among people. In the case of a kiss on the hand, it is evidence that the dreamer is a very generous person. Seeing an unmarried woman with a dead man holding her hand and kissing her in a dream means that she will gain happiness and respect among people, and she is a kind-hearted girl who will do all religious matters completely. Kissing a dead person on The hand of a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence that she will give birth to obedient children in public life and will be fair to their father. Interpretation of kissing a dead child in a dream A woman embraces a dead child in a dream, and her child was dead in public life, evidence of her desire to see her son in public life, and in the event that he appears Wearing a beautiful white robe, this is evidence that he is one of the children of Paradise. Seeing a dead child in a dream and he was beautiful in the dream, is evidence that the dreamer will get good money soon, and he will also become good. The dreamer who kisses the head of a child who died a while ago in the dream , evidence that the dreamer will become good, because in the future he will be well

Evidence that the dreamer longs to see the deceased and learn about his condition and the extent of the love between them. Something like work and things. Hugging the dead in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a generous person and gives alms to people and is not stingy with anything, so the dreamer has great value with his Lord. Seeing a dead child in a dream and he was beautiful in the dream, is evidence that the dreamer will get good money soon, and he will also become good. The dreamer Whoever kisses the head of a child who died some time ago in a dream, is evidence that the dreamer will become good, because in the near future

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Safa and Marwah by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Who among us does not dream of visiting Mecca, Hajj or Umrah, running between Safa and Marwah, and drinking Zamzam water, and because all of the above are nothing but good deeds. The story of the dream of seeing Safa and Marwah by Ibn Sirin. It is a good vision, God willing, that we present to you in this article on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of the dream of seeing Al-Safa and Al-Marwah by Ibn Sirin. The dream in which a Muslim sees the mountains of Al-Safa and Al-Marwah, so he either runs or prays to them. This indicates the integrity of this man’s religion, and that he is one of God’s righteous servants. Indeed, he occupies a very high position because of his deeds. It may also indicate that This man can be a leader of the people, and, God willing, he will be a good leader. And God will guide him to what he loves and is pleasing to him, so the dream shows that the dreamer is a good husband, the best father, and the best of people. Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation of Hajj in his dreams that the person visits Safa and Marwah and striving between them. It indicates However, man struggles in this world for his religion because he always tries to be one of God’s righteous servants. This dream may be an interpretation that God Almighty has accepted his deeds and that He will reward him for his good deeds. By visiting God’s holy house soon, God willing, he will rejoice better than This is a pleasant vision. Al-Safa and Al-Marwah are a dwelling place for a person: Whoever dreams that Al-Safa and Al-Marwah is his home and people visit it. This means that this man’s house is a righteous house and his family are righteous, and his house will be a place where people turn to solve their problems and the place they turn to when they seek advice, so keep In your house as much as possible. Amer with Muslims and a place often mentioned by God and whose people will remain among the righteous, God willing. According to some commentators, the chase between Safa and Marwah in a dream means that the one who had the vision will soon achieve a great position and may have high authority, so he must consider God In the responsibility that he will bear. And also to be the best shepherd for the good of the shepherd, so you should rejoice better than this dream and repeat your tongue always and forever. A supplication that the Lord of the Worlds will grant you success in everything that He loves and is pleased with, so that your affairs will not be spoiled, and that you will always remain surrounded by God’s goodness and grace. And whoever It is believed that his son is the one who goes in pursuit between Safa and Marwah, so this means a lot of good for that young man. He is one of the righteous, to whom God gives abundant good, God willing, and gives him of His bounty whatever He wants. Seeing effort in a married woman’s dream. Interpretation of chasing Safa and Marwah in a dream For a married woman who suffers from many problems in her life with her husband. If he is afraid of his imminent divorce, then he should not be afraid after this vision. It announces good circumstances, God willing, and that God will write good things for her and what will make his heart happy, and he will be forced if he is wronged. And whoever sees her as a member of her family, her sister. , or her husband’s brother, or her brother, or her cousins ​​and aunts, escaped from Safa and Marwa. Then he goes to the Kaaba and enters it, meaning that whoever was in the dream will abandon celibacy and get married soon, God willing. Whether this person is in the wrong or not among the righteous, his condition After this vision, he will change and he will become one of those who walk on the straight path. Perhaps one of the important things will happen to him in his life, such as an accident.

preview.html: Therefore, the meanings and connotations differed according to the dream and the social status of the visionary or fortune teller, and from gptafser.com/ we will talk about this in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream for a single girl The single girl who dreams that she is traveling in a dream, and that was in reality. Suffering from pain or distress is a sign from God Almighty that the distress will end, God willing. As for the girl who sees herself traveling to a country she loves and thinks about all the time in a dream. It is a good sign of her marriage to a man with whom she is happy and lives with him in stability and happiness. The vision also indicates facilitating matters and the situation and solving problems. Seeing travel in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates a radical change in the dreamer's life for the better. It also indicates that something she has been waiting for for a long time will happen and cause her happiness. As for the single girl who suffers from loneliness in her life and dreams of traveling. It is a sign that he is about to get rid of loneliness and begins to establish new social relationships. An unmarried girl saw that she was traveling with a stranger in a dream and was happy. It is a good sign that she will marry a wealthy man. Seeing a single girl traveling by plane in a dream is a good omen To succeed in studying. But if she sees that she is traveling with someone she knows and has feelings of love, this is a sign that she will marry the young man she loves. See also: Interpretation of a dream about traveling with relatives for singles Interpretation of seeing a trip in a dream for a married woman When a married woman dreams that she is traveling and is sad and unhappy, this is a sign that she is not satisfied with her husband. Perhaps it indicates the separation of the banner from her husband by divorce. In the event that a married woman sees that she is traveling in a dream and is accompanied by a young child. It is good news when you hear the long-awaited news of pregnancy. And the married woman who suffers from a financial crisis and sees that she traveled by plane is a good omen for improving conditions. But if the married woman sees that she is traveling for a specific purpose and this does not happen in the dream, this is a sign of divorce and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is traveling and happy, this is a sign of marital happiness. It also indicates that you hear the good news that she is waiting for. It indicates the success of the banner of children in school and in life in general. Interpretation of seeing travel in a dream about a man and its meaning Traveling in a man's dream symbolizes the dreamer's achievement of dreams and aspirations and self-realization. The man who sees himself Traveling by car in a dream is a sign of relief from pain and a speedy recovery, God willing. A man who suffers from a financial problem in his life and dreams that he is traveling in a dream. It is a sign of sustenance and relief, God willing, and freedom from debt. But if a man dreams that he is traveling to a country he loves, this is a sign that he will get rid of his problems and begin to feel comfortable. If a man dreams that he is traveling with his wife and he is happy, this is a sign of a happy married life. A man who sees himself traveling by car in a country he loves is a metaphor for getting a promotion at work. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a trip in a dream in detail The meaning of seeing travel in a dream
